name: Aromates
memberOrga: Aromates est membre de Syntec Relations Publics : http://www.syntec-rp.com/
goal: Based in Paris, Aromates has been operating in the field of public relations for almost 30 years. During that period, it has become a leading organizer of events, networking activities and communication platforms, particularly in the areas of digital industries, energy and health.
interests: Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market / Reform of EU data protection rules
ePrivacy / Internet of things /
Health Policies
Greentech, energy and waste
